QuestData.Title: Heroic: Algalon
QuestData.Description: You really did it, $n. Take the sigils to the Archivum Console and see if you can gain access to the Celestial Planetarium.$B$BYou best hurry, $g lad:lass;. Time is of the essence.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Sigils of the Watchers to the Archivum Console in Ulduar.
QuestData.CompletionText: The console's bright lights scan the glass surface repeatedly, as if awaiting some form of input.
QuestData.RewardText: Stand by for verification.$b$bAccess to the Celestial Planetarium granted. Please retrieve your key.
